Name: Siddaramaiah
Tweet: In Bellary you are asking for vote for a candidate who is the brother of the mining mafia kingpin G. Janardhana Reddy who brought shame to Bellry & the state. And you say Congress has insulted Bellary. Pray, how?  ಸುಳ್ಳು ಹೇಳುವುದಕ್ಕೂ ಒಂದು ಮಿತಿ ಇರಬೇಕು!  #ModiHitWicket  https://t.co/HCOcizbQN7
